errors.error_description: The installation command `pip install hydra --upgrade` uses an incorrect package name. The correct package is `hydra-core`.
correction_candidates: Change the installation command to `pip install hydra-core --upgrade`.
Change the installation command to `pip install hydra-core`.
Change the installation command to `pip install facebook-hydra --upgrade`.
errors.golden_answer: Change the installation command to `pip install hydra-core --upgrade`.
